entry.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
entry.content: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

entry.title: majidmanzarpour/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: Arpityadav11/HomiFy: HomiFy is a lightweight Airbnb-inspired web application built with Node.js, Express, EJS, and MongoDB. It allows users to list and explore accommodations, providing an intuitive and user-friendly experience for travelers and hosts.
entry.content: HomiFy is a lightweight Airbnb-inspired web application built with Node.js, Express, EJS, and MongoDB. It allows users to list and explore accommodations, providing an intuitive and user-friendly experience for travelers and hosts.

entry.title: ravipajiyar/Sticky-Note: Notes App is a lightweight browser-based note-taking tool with color-coding, categorization, and search features. Pin important notes, toggle dark mode, and resize notes as needed. Built with JavaScript and IndexedDB for offline storage, it requires no server to run.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.
entry.content: Notes App is a lightweight browser-based note-taking tool with color-coding, categorization, and search features. Pin important notes, toggle dark mode, and resize notes as needed. Built with JavaScript and IndexedDB for offline storage, it requires no server to run.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.

entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization‚Äîresizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
entry.content: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization‚Äîresizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: xjsdev/iorpc: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.
entry.content: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.
